newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkish shares edged up 0,31 percent in mixed trade.
newsitem.headline: Turkish shares edged up 0,31 percent in mixed trade.

text.p: The Istanbul stock exchange index edged up on the day, while most shares reverted off highs earlier in the day.
The index fluctuated between 1,913 and 1,959 within the day.
The IMKB National-100 ended up 6 points, or 0.31 percent at 1,925 at close.
Daily volume jumped to 26.46 trillion lira ($167.4 million), compared to Tuesday's 17.58 trillion lira ($111.6 million).
